introduction: Before the arrival of European settlers, Australia was home to more than 200 languages. Many of thes

vocabulary.definition: at risk of extinction or disappearance
vocabulary.example: Polar bears are considered an endangered species due to climate change.
She has a deep interest in linguistically diverse cultures.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the indigenous people of a region
vocabulary.example: The aboriginal tribes have rich cultural traditions passed down for generations.

vocabulary.definition: a person sent to spread their religion to a foreign country
vocabulary.example: The missionary traveled to Africa to build schools and churches.

vocabulary.definition: a person who does not belong to a widely held religion
vocabulary.example: In the historical novel, the protagonist encounters a group of heathens in the forest.

vocabulary.definition: in a way that is contrary to what is expected or intended
vocabulary.example: Ironically, the raincoat I bought to stay dry ended up leaking during the storm.
